content.detailedDescription: I was in my carpool as a passenger in the front seat.  the weather was perfectly clear and the light was bright.  i was looking out of the passenger window and idly ran my eyes up the side of a mirrored building approx. 15 degrees to the right of my central view point.  as i followed the building up, i noticed the reflection of the craft in the side of the building.  i then noticed the craft itself - it was silver, shiny, somewhat bullet/chevron shaped with three light in the rear of the craft  - two red, one white.  there were no visible windows.  no other object was in the area - again, the sky was clear blue.  the craft remained stationary for the time of about one minute, then accelerated to the northeast, over downtown minneapolis.  there was no noise from the craft as well.  i was quite stunned, then surprise as i realized i had just witnessed an unexplained object.
content.summary: Observed craft accidently-was viewing building when noticed reflection of craft.

content.detailedDescription:
I couldn't sleep so i called a friend. we were talking as i was looking out the back windows of my house. the time was around 3:00 am. suddenly i saw three bright lights off in the distance and thought it could be the flashlights from people camping as we live on a mountain. then one light, the largest, sped up across and down so fast i knew immediately these were not campers or kids playing around. the distance the lights traveled up and down would assure anyone no human can move that fast!  there was no noise, nothing but the lights.  my mind was confused, i couldn't imagine what was out there, at the same time i felt amused almost entertained and then scared the more i watched them. i was speechless as my friend kept asking, "are you alright?" the orbs or circular lights totaled three in all, i think, unless the one that came up to my house was a fourth one. the three i saw all looked identical in shape, color, and put off a softer light or aura around them. they moved so fast it was crazy. i turned away from the window, scared, then suddenly a bright light covered the house and i reopened the blinds after shutting them to look.  i  new because i could feel this object was just hovering to my right. then it was gone and i was back on the bed talking on the phone. i felt really tired and was asleep shortly after this incident.  

i must add; when i was around twenty-two years old i was told i had been kidnapped at the age of four, when we lived in ca.  the story from my mother and my sister seemed far too short and very rehearsed.  this was later confirmed to me by a few psychologists. the story only changed by my father and it regarded the time period i was missing. my mother said three hours my dad said three days. i only bring this up because years after this and during a conversation i had with someone on the board of ufo abductions (unbenounced to me)informed me i had been abducted at that age not kidnapped.  he assured me i had all the "trademarks" of an abductee, i thought he was crazy.  turns out what he said to me was no crazier than how my life would play out!  i called an organization, trying to reach out to anyone regarding constant night terrors and waking every morning at 3:00 am since i was a child. in all honesty i would not be surprised if i had more encounters. i think once people are chosen, for whatever reason, there's not much you can do. whether these are spiritual encounters, as some people believe, or alien encounters it makes little difference, your life will never be the same. 

while reading what information your site accepts i had no idea i could submit art work.  there are some drawings i have done over the years that i do not understand myself, one in particular.  perhaps i can post them another time.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed 3 circles of light in back yard located on mountainside where military used to practice. hovered, sped so fast up and down then i looked away. i think one, not sure if all three, in an instant was hovering next to my room and then in a se

content.detailedDescription:
On the date given above, around 6:15 am i called my father, as i do every morning after i leave the house.  the conversation started out normal, he father stated "good morning and is it cold enough for you". i relied to him and the next thing that came out of his mouth was "do you see the ufo in the east sky". my thought at first was oh boy my father has lost his marbles because i am traveling east and don't see anything.  plus i'm almost 40 and never not once believed in ufos or anything along that long. as i drove a little down the road rounded the curve and got out from behind the trees i got the shock of my life there it was sitting so beautiful in the sky shinning so proudly, the straight up and down shinny object my father was talking about.  as i drive the object appears to be just hovering around the flintville area.  i thought ok i'm going to make it to the store stop and take a picture, which that didn't happen because now the object was behind me. i made my way onto highway 64 heading to winchester where i work,called my mother because now i'm excited for seeing such a thing.  as i'm on the phone with my mother in the right outside the huntland i notice two more cigar shaped objects over the keith springs mountain area.  i saw them the whole time i drove down highway 64 until i turned on the road i worked on.  i worked a nine hour shift that day and got off at 4:30 pm.  jumped on highway 64 heading back west, called my mother once again, she telling me what the doctor said about my son that day.  as i rounded the curve on the 64 i saw the three cigar shaped objects all together now in the west sky...Hours later after the first sighting and them separate.  i told my mother and see wanted picture i pulled off of the highway took two pictures of the objects, but didn't like the quality because they were too far away. i called my mother back and told her i was going to drive further up the road and get a better picture of these three objects. a minute and half into this conversation the three objects disappeared into thin air as if they never were there.

please note you will have to zoom in to see the two that are going side to side!!!!
content.summary: Silver shinny cigar shaped objects in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
November 21, 2014 

white sphere seen slowly (nnw)heading north by north west at about 9 to 10 thousand feet agl(altitude ground level)...... approximately. for those people thinking international space station, it heads in an eastern direction. 


i called a friend to go out to see the object. time noted on cell phone when i called my friend was 6:11 pm. as i called my friend it suddenly dimmed and seemed to speed up. it may have also climbed in altitude? in a few seconds i lost sight of it due to light pollution and it being so far on the horizon. estimation of total time of sighting was two minutes or less. my friend has lots of trees and tall building around his homes outer perimeter. so his view was blocked where i told him the object was in reference to his location. 

shortly after the object was gone, i notice a small aircraft heading south. in reference to the white sphere seen, in estimation the object was slight higher in elevation and slightly farther away from me. estimated size of round white sphere was about 3/16th of an inch in size at arm’s length.
the object made no sound and had no visible faa markers. nothing on the object blinked. 

picture submitted. it is only a reference in that it is similar. the star map is actual time frame of the sighting.
content.summary: White round sphereical glowing object

content.detailedDescription: Lights illuminated, 1 light litterally shot a beem down towards ground, but to far away & dark outside to see if anything was present in beam.  i have seen this for the whole month of november, every other night. 2-3 lights, blue/white, red, yellow,violet; this is not the first in my area for sightings, but nobody speaks of ufo's except for myself & my wife to each other. live in small town, don't want the gossip.  i had also felt hypnotised by the light, and noticed an hour went by around 2 am, and it felt like 5 minutes.  it was intriguing, but strange.  i didn't feel frightned, but i did feel like i was watching over my shoulder, as if i were being paranoid. unfortanetly, i didn't take a picture, it was only 19 degrees outside, and my fingers were numb.
content.summary: Lights illuminated 1 light litterally shot beem down towards ground but to far away & dark outside to see anything was present in beam.  i have seen this for the whole month of november, every other night. 2-3 lights, blue/white, red, yellow,violet

content.detailedDescription:
I nightly pick up my child from dance near march afb in riverside ca. we continually (numerous nights) see star like lights floating and hovering all over moreno valley ca (were we drive is only blocks from the city of moreno valley border.. they will travel great distances in seconds. they will hover for several minutes, they will float slowly above clouds. we have seen them close up cut off the lights, but for a few vague seconds we can see its a physical craft, just not clearly enough to make it out.
we have seen the object after hovering for several minutes, change their shape and have wings and basically transform to look like a small plane.. when this happens they no longer hover, but fly away like a plane, but with zero sound and at a real slow pace. much slower than a plane travels..
i have seen these in different parts of the city. i went onto youtube and several posts from this area seen similar type objects..
content.summary: Day after day see hovering objects that sometimes tranform shape

content.detailedDescription: I was probably about 10 years old. one night my friend jack and i were laying on the trampoline in the backyard.After staring at the stars for a moment we noticed 4 "stars" becoming brighter.From what i remember they then began to come to what would have been the center of the diamond pattern. they shot out to the four corners and then back in several times.After hovering for a few minutes. at this point, i remember my little sister running into the house in fear. jack and i were to excited to stop watching. they lights then came together as one again and shot of towards the east. it was an event i will never forget. we tried convincing our parents about the event, but they at the time refused to believe us, and shrugged it off as childhood imagination. we know what we saw. jack and i still from time to time being it up in conversation years later.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Lying on trampoline with friend as child. light in a diamond or square sharp came together ad apart several times and then shot off after hovering over the area for a short time.

content.detailedDescription: I cant explain it .....Something makes me to forget it.......I m sorry........But i feel something like we r in danger......
content.summary: It happened in dark night in the sky.An object like boomerang in shape and big in size emitted a small object which went inside the bay of bengal sea...And the big ship flew away in a fraction of second.

content.detailedDescription: Woke up at 5:15 am saw what appeared to be a star.  it was directly below orion in the sky.  it began making short vertical movements toward the ground and on occasion would go back up a bit.  it paused between these spurts.  it was very high. it would have been mistaken for a planet if not for the movement.  as it approached the treeline while still dropping, it began  to take a more horizontal path and drifted towards the north.  this is were it was when starting to get upstructed by the trees.  it began heading north (still moving quite slowly) only after it had dropped half way below orion and the tree line. i knew it was a ufo.  i had seen a much more impressive one before.  i got tired of watching it and would have had to go outdoors to watch it further so i went back to sleep.
content.summary: Looked exactly like a star but moved in verticle spurts then vertically plus horisonally toward the north

content.detailedDescription: Sittin around campfire about 8 or 9 pm
content.summary: (rjl} white light over campgroud

content.detailedDescription: My daughter was outside taking the garbage to the curb when she seen a green light flying towards her from  making no sound. she ran in to tell me. i ran out and seen the light moving away from us maybe 30 to 60 seconds we heard something behind us very load in the sky that's when two planes flying in formation in the same direction as the light flu over head. at this point the green light was not visible anymore but the planes flu another 2000 feet or so over the airport and made a hard right and flu sw till you could no longer see them
content.summary: Green light in the sky, followed by two milatery planes

content.detailedDescription: Ok i look up all the time at the sky have a 10" meade telescope look at the stars seen nothing but stars but im always lookin up day time night time looking ive seen planes night and day over the 401 highway from toronto to montreal seems jets fly that path back and forth seen them for 40 years do this what i saw was different in was to far south in the sky for planes ive seen for years go this way it was not cloudy but big slow white clouds moving west to east i looked up south to play my second shot oh ya i was golfing at greeb ancres golf coarse and i see 2 cigar objects going west im lookin south 1 goes into clouds ans i say to my golfin buddy look see that he says ya we see another cigar shape grey follow it then we see it turn like 180 back towards east on a dime it seems straight line east but it shinned once when sun hit it the sun was west maybe 3 quaters setting i thought if it was a plane u would keep shinning but it didnt and it was quick zoom into the clouds all 3 of us saw it we see planes all the time this was no plane hope this helps u guys any other sightings that day u know of /?
content.summary: Me and 2 friends golfing seen a cigar shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
It was the night before the general election
the time is ify it would have been between 11:00pm on the 3rd
to 3:00am on the 4th 


i was taking some trash out to the trash can, we live near airport, heard a jet fly over, i looked up saw this yellowish square object flying across the sky. as i was watching it, i notice i could not hear the jet anymore. so i wondered what this object was. if i held my hand out at arms length and had my index finger and thumb about an 1/4 inch apart. that is how big the object looked. i figured i just saw the space station just fly over(?). 

what ever it was it made no noise, and had to be very big 
(it was very high in the sky).
it came out of the northwest and traveled to the south east 
(what you would expect from a space station fly over.)

we live in the woods, tall trees so the object was not in view for very long
(1min - less)

since then i have heard of several reports of people seeing a amber object, so i thought i would just log the event.
content.summary: Herd jet pass over, looked up saw object, jet noise stopped, object continued accrosssky silently

content.detailedDescription:
On saturday november 22, 2014 at approximately 12:18 am i, jonathan leasor was standing on my enclosed back porch of my apartment, looking out towards the west. at that time i noticed a series of tight-knit lights; 4-5 extremely bright flickering white lights and one stationary red light at one end of an object that i could only guesstimate was either disk shaped or cylindrical due to the orientation of the lights. i was unsure if i was viewing a plane heading towards the cleveland airport as i had viewed on many occasions before, but this unidentified object hovered over the downtown cleveland skyline for approximately three minutes. shortly after three minutes the object smoothly and without effort appeared to go backwards and again remain stationary for nearly one minute. the object then went back to it's position in which i initially noticed it. shortly thereafter the object pivoted to a 10 o'clock position and then ascended into cloud cover at what appeared to be double the speed rate of an airplane, yet much slower than a military fighter jet.

i am willing to speak to a mufon representative to show my exact location etc. i can also sketch what i viewed to the best of my ability.

sincerely,

[name removed/cms/rjl]
content.summary: Disk or cylindrical object hovering over downtown cleveland oh

content.detailedDescription: I noticed the objects when i was driving in a west direction at 2145. the objects were bright and there about 10 of them in an orange red color. there wasn't a specific shape of these objects but they were at one point stationary and then right before they took off into "nowhere" they moved unusually fast leaving no trail. i saw them and immediately felt that it was something odd, something that i couldn't explain. my husband a skeptic of everything looked at the sky and said "they are obviously planes headed to oceana naval air base" i could tell that they were not planes. i made it to my house, and was able to take a short video of one of the orbs. then about 10 minutes after they showed up everyone of the objects disappeared as oddly as they showed up and never came back.
content.summary: Orangish  red objects

content.detailedDescription: I saw a solid light go from west to east with no sound at a high rate of speed afterwards i could hear jets in the distance of where it headed view lasted 30 seconds was fast and quite solid light no blinking lights like a plane
content.summary: It flew from west to east no sound solid light afterwards sound of jets in distance

content.detailedDescription:
I am submitting this report as a result of a telephone conversation with john ventre on friday at 6 pm on 11/21/14.  the list below is the description based on the questionnaire provided for reference.

1.  stepson outside of car to observe odd atmosphere
2.  upside down rainbow in sky
3.  didn't notice object until picture developed
4.  disc shape - only seen when picture was developed
5.  only noticed when picture was developed
6.  never seen object.  the odd atmosphere attracted the attention

i am submitting the photo for your review.
content.summary: A photo was taken by my stepson when he observed what appeared to be an upside down rainbow.

content.detailedDescription:
As stated to asd by phone today - witness would not file report himself and wishes to remain anonymous. 

"i was sitting on my back deck one evening at about 1:00 - 2:00 a.M. during the first week of august, 2014. my friend had just gotten out of the navy and we were visiting. the sky was clear and it was dark outside. suddenly, a bright flash of light, kind of like a flash from a camera, flashed on us from above for about three to four seconds. it was a fast pulsing light that was blinding and covered an area of the deck around us in a five to six foot diameter circle. there was no sound. we immediately jumped up and looked overhead and all around the yard and house but could find nothing. there was some heat from the light and my friend said that his head was hot. he shaves his head and i don't. the next day, he came over and he had a burn mark the size of a penny on the back of his head, which he believes was caused by the light. we asked another friend of ours who is in the military and works with drones if it could have been a drone, but he said that absolutely not because drones do make a sound and for it to be close enough to flash a light like that it would have had to been heard as well. we are both a little freaked out by this and just want to know if anything like this has happened to anyone else. i don't know where the light came from or what it wanted, but it was so strange that i'd have to put it in the ufo category. i've never seen a ufo or anything strange before in my entire life and didn't believe in that stuff. i didn't know where to report this until i just saw the hangar 1 show and they were talking about the blue springs lights so i thought i'd call in to let you know about this." 

note: the witnesses are both males in their late 20's.
content.summary: Bright light flash from over our heads burned my friend

content.detailedDescription: On going!!!!!!!!!
content.summary: 14 years, i moved, still having contact.

content.detailedDescription: While starting my car at 5:33am this friday, nov. 21st, 2104, something made me look straight up into the night sky.  directly above my head was a very bright light.  the beam seemed to be shinning at a 45 degree angle to the sw of my location.  the beam was only admitting light for about 20 seconds.  in that time i could see that there was an object connected to the light. i estimated the object to be about 500 feet or so in the night sky.  the sky was clear and many stars were visible giving somewhat of a reference to how high in the sky the object was.  i live in s.E. minnesota.  the light slowly dimmed, and at this time i could see the craft that was admitting the light.  it was saucer shaped and about 50-75 feet circumference.  with the lights of the town, the object was low enough i could see it.  i thought maybe it was brownish in color, but after thinking about it, the craft could have been reflecting back the orange colored street lights. the craft hovered for about a minute and then very slowly it started to move to the east.  made no sound and there were no other lights on the craft that i could see.  the craft moved off not moving any faster than about 20 mph.  i watched it to the point i no longer could see it which was about a 3 minute time span.
content.summary: Hovering saucer gave out a beem of light, then light disappeared then flew off

content.detailedDescription: We were 18 and going cross country, 2 cars spending our nights at koa's and  national parks.. we  were stopping at places of interest and had stopped at a park  and we're sitting in the car smoking cigarettes and playing cards as the car was under a light pole. i looked out and saw  delta formations of lights . each formation consisted  of 6 or 10 craft.  we watched as they proceeded to put on an air show . it was obvious that this was a demonstration for someone . the actions of these delta formations was extreme in speed and directional changes . they would go to the stars and then return to earth, then back  to what appeared to be the main stage overhead, then dash to the stars . i remember that at some point they returned to earth , which due to the topography we could not see directly.We could see a glow that was beyond the arroyos, i think that is the term ,as the land was dry,baked and consisting of rises and gullies that we had to climb up and over only to find another gulley. i believe these are the result of rain and erosion. we eventually gave up , this was44 years ago and with so much now having been revealed, this air show was certainly meant for someone .I don't believe area 51 was common knowledge. certainly not to me. a footnote would be that with this same friend an enormous ufo passed his house, so close we could see figures in the windows.We ran into the yard and the entire family watched as it went at treetop height towards edgemont high school. this sighting was in the papers as it was tracked from nyc.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: .Starlike

content.detailedDescription:
November 20, 2014


     my sister and i were driving toward clarksburg wv, on us-19 about 2 miles outside of shinnston, wv.  it was around 19:30 when i saw the lights out in the distance.  i noticed two white lights above a hill.  they looked like headlights.  it was about as high as a cell tower.  i thought it might be for a while because the lights were staying in one place. something didn’t seem quite right with it. i pointed it out to my sister.  she agreed it didn’t look right. we became transfixed on this light.  it was hard to concentrate on driving.

     we rounded a turn and the lights are now on our right.  we’re both staring at these lights suspended above the hill. we are now about a mile from where we first saw the lights.  then the object started moving. it flew over the road to our left an unknown distance in front of us.  we began to feel uneasy.  as it flew over the road something came out of the object.  it looked like a fireball.  it was attached to the object because any move the object made it did too, but it never returned to the object.  the object turned back toward us and flew directly over us.

     i had my window down with my head halfway out the window, and i couldn’t make out any shape to the object.  the radio was off, and i couldn’t hear any sound coming from the object.  i opened the moonroof of the truck and my sister got a very good look at the lights, and she said that she couldn’t make out anything on it either.  it was like it was there, but not.  it’s something that i can’t quite find the words to describe.  i went and turned around at a diner that was right up the road.  when we came back it was gone.

     we dismissed it as probably an airplane, and we were overreacting.  we went into town and got what we needed.  on the way back, we used i-79n to fairmont.  there was a small plane that was trying to line up for landing at the north central west virginia airport.  it flew over the interstate and made a sharp turn similar to that the object made earlier.  this is when the differences in the two became apparent.  

    one, the plane had a lot more lights than the object had earlier in the night.  the plane had red and green lights that were clearly visible.  two, the plane was faster than our object.  finally, the plane’s turn was nothing like our object’s turn.  the plane didn’t have the maneuverability the object did.  when he plane turned it banked to one side.  whereas, our object stayed on a flat plane the entire time.  the plane went a great distance to make a turn.  ours made the turn in an instant.  it moved much more gracefully than the plane did.

     i don’t know what i saw.  i do know that the object was less than 500 feet above us, and neither of us could make out any shape to the object.  i also know that whatever came out of the object didn’t appear to go back to the object.  i don’t know what it was or if there is physical evidence out there.  there is a public trail over there.  i plan to go out this weekend to search for anything that might have come down.
content.summary: Hovering lights emit fireball and fly over car.

content.detailedDescription: Please attached the three photos to case 61370
content.summary: Brilliantly bright cigar shaped vessel, 40 feet long, 15 ft wide, close encounter

content.detailedDescription: It was a clear cold starry night sky. i saw a distorted area of the sky traveling west to east. it is hard to describe an invisible object and almost impossible to tell how far away it was. it was as area of distorted sky moving smoothly and fast at a constant speed. prior to this i saw two very bright stars appear and disappear in seconds in the north sky. brighter then the other stars. it wasn't a flash just a blink.
content.summary: It was invisible it's hard to describe an invisible object. i could see the sky right through it. it was a area traveling and the area was a distorted area of the nigh star lit sky.

content.detailedDescription:
my brother in law and i were coming home from work. the time was about 7:15 pm and had already become dark. he was driving and i was in the passenger side of his truck. we were about 30 miles south of atlanta on state hwy 85 headed south to senoia,ga.
   we had crossed the fayette county line and was going up this hill, which is about a one mile incline. about half way up the hill an object passed over us. it was headed east to west at treetop height. i asked my brother in law if he just saw what i did. he had.
   i could not discern the structual features. it appeared to be something like a light bar with three green lights. the middle light was off centered to the left but on line with the other two. the lights appeared to be about the size of a stop sign and were not flashing or strobing.
   the tree line obstructed my view for a few seconds then i could see it again. it was in a valley still at treetop height and moving westward. it seemed to be just gliding along. the three lights were still visible but had changed color to white
    this was not an airplane. i have lived around the atl airport most of my life and have seen many aircraft at night. i also was  an air traffic controller for 12 years. three of those years were in  vfr tower. the rest were at radar facilities.
     i've never seen what i saw a few weeks ago.
content.summary: Object moved east to west at treetops. three green lights then changed to white.

content.detailedDescription: I was at a rodeo with family & decided to take a picture of the awesome sunset. the ufo's were caught by accident in this picture. look just to the left of the center field light. i didnt notice the ufos/orbs til later that night.
content.summary: I was at the carroll county rodeo that evening. i took a picture of the awesome colors of the sunset on the clouds & purposely caught the rider on the horse. by accident i caught the 5 yellow orbs just barely to the left of the center light.

content.detailedDescription: I am a night supervisor and usually up on my nights off.  i am a smoker and do not smoke in my house.  at 3:05am on the morning of november 17th, i went out my front door to have a smoke like normal.  i have always been interested in stars so on a clear night like it was, i look at the stars.  my house faces south.  i was there for a few minutes when a  light caught my eye almost straight south of me.  it looked like a shooting star,  but was moving in an upwards and west direction.  it faded out and i didn't think much of it other than being a little strange it was going up and not down or across.  then just seconds later from where it had faded out, it appeared again and shot straight back to the east and faded out again.  that really shocked me.  then it appeared again and it shot straight up and to the west and disappeared.  this all took place in a matter of about 10-15 seconds.  i am a skeptic, but i know what i saw was strange and would like an explanation.  no technology we have could move as fast as this and falling/shooting stars do not change direction.
content.summary: Small star like light changing direction.

content.detailedDescription:
1. driving a truck on rt 8 toward phoenix, arizona. coordinates 32.848865 and  -113.268015
2. very bright, hovering orbs in the middle of nowhere.
3. a tower.
4. two large, round orbs of light. approximate coordinates 32.846173 and -113.243883 sometimes they pulsated, sometimes they disappeared. 
5. i was surprised to see lights in the middle of the desert. i videotaped and photographed the event. 
6. it disappeared after observing it for twenty minutes.
7. i googled the area i was in and found strange crop circle-like formations approximately 30 miles south of the orbs. the crop circle had a another pattern above it with the roman numeral iv inscribed in it. there were two long roads leading away from the crop circle. one of which led to a square formation with the obvious picture of a white airplane parked in it. the very long road eventually leads to what appears to be a structure near rt 8. i found all of this on google maps. coordinates for crop circle 32.765941 and -113.090257 
8. i'm nervous about even telling anyone this information. i don't want my name in the news and i don't want any trouble. 
9. let me know if you want the video and photographs.
content.summary: Truck driver sees pulsating, fireballs hover and disappear

content.detailedDescription: I was at home and getting clothes off the rope and it was 7.30 to 8.30 am.I just saw hill in front of our house. it was near a electric tower.. my father and mother also saw a red or orange coloured  bright thing in sky at 9 before 2 days.I thinked its a new type of plane.First i saw it was big  10-20 feets in lenght and it gone straight and fast to forest side .It gone
content.summary: I saw it  between 7:30-8:30 am . and between 5-8 november.It was beautiful and new  disk and very bright

content.detailedDescription: It was the early morning of halloween, when, i got to the observatory early to look at the stars with the telescope. when, i, got to looking at the stars, i swear, i could see a blue-white light in the telescope. this strange blue-white light, i could swear, was going incredibly fast. so fast that it was probably going at phantom speeds of fifty thousand miles per hour. how was that possible, i thought, an object, if it was an object, could go at fifty thousand miles per hour, and, then suddenly make a sudden turn like that with ease? it was not possible for an object that was gold-copper and flashing randomly a blue-white light to go at phantom speeds of fifty thousand miles per hour. then, all of sudden, the gold-copper object was getting faster than before. my devices, suddenly, told me, that, the gold-copper object was now going at phantom speeds of fifty-seven thousand and five hundred miles per hour. it was fifteen to twenty minutes later, that, suddenly, the object suddenly stopped, for no reasons, said. with the telescope, i swear, i could see the object, it was a gold-copper rectangular object with windows! windows! how's that possible?! how is it, that, what i'm seeing, is possible?! it couldn't be a "flying saucer"! a "flying saucer"!!! upon underneath the windows, where, i could also swear, there was some movement, i saw where the blue-white lights came from. the blue-white lights came from exterior circular objects, that, were underneath the square windows. these exterior circular objects that were flashing blue-white lights were part and attached to the gold-copper rectangle with square windows. suddenly, i, saw another pair of movement, but couldn't see through the windows, but i could swear to myself, that these beings in the gold-copper rectangle were, physically, human, or at least, humanoid. then, all of sudden, a smaller cube object, came off the gold-copper rectangle's back. the cube was made of some white metallic alloys, and, it was big as the apollo lunar module, though, much smaller than the gold-copper rectangle object itself. the cube was going at phantom speeds of twenty-five thousand miles per hour, which shocked me. suddenly, the cube, by my calculations, was going to land in the small town of gillette, here in new jersey. i, suddenly, got into my car and drove to gillette, but then something popped in my mind. how's this also possible that no one else, but, me is hearing and seeing this?! how, and, why, not others?! when, i, got to gillette, there were some cars driving pass me, and, one person honked me in his car. i waved backed, but he'd drove away, normally. then, suddenly, the white cube was now above me. upon, my closer examinations, the white cube was hovering above me, then, suddenly, beams of blue-white lights appeared, and, then, to my shocked face, a humanoid appeared. the humanoid was wearing a silver-chrome skin-tight jumpsuit-like spacesuit with a white metallic space helmet. the face of the humanoid couldn't be seen through the space helmet, because, it look like a one-way or a two-way mirror circular glass upon the space helmet. also, upon the back of the space helmet-spacesuit was, what to me, appeared to be two white rectangular tanks. i asked the humanoid about them, it told me that, in an almost strange language, that it was argon and nitrogen tanks. then, i looked at the belt of the humanoid's spacesuit, and, also about it, because, the belt of the humanoid's spacesuit was odd. for example, the middle of the belt was in the shape of a cube and the rest was written in a strange language around it. the humanoid, then, put its left hand around my face, touching my face, for no reasons. the humanoid said, "what are you"? i, being professional, said that i'm a astrophysicist. the humanoid then, again, for reasons unknown, showed me its hands. the humanoid's hands had six, perfectly formed and functioning, fingers on each of the humanoid's hands. the humanoid, then, pulled out a small spherical device from the belt. the humanoid then said something to the sphere, which glowed a glowing and pulsating red color when the humanoid talked to it. the humanoid said, this device, captures and transmits tachyons. then, suddenly, the humanoid returned to its cube and blasted off, knocking me off my feet. suddenly, i blacked out. then, what appeared to be a few hours later, i stand up, and i saw no trace of evidence of what had happened, so i got to my car and droved home. a few days later, someone, was knocking on my door. when, i, answered it, three men in black clothing came upon me with their black sunglasses. the middle of the three men spoke to me and said that nothing happened in the early morning of halloween. i was confused. why, and how?! suddenly, the right man pulled out a black gun and pointed at my face, while, the left man pulled out a small pocketknife and pointed at my throat. the middle man said that they can make me disappear, if i don't tale anyone about halloween morning. i said, sure, then the three man got angry at me and, in a union, promised to not tell. i, scared, said sure. then, the three men said, again, in a union, that they know where i live and where i work at. then they droved off in a black van with windows completely covered up. that's why i'am here.
content.summary: Halloween nightmare.
